languages.text: {n}По лицу Соломона ходят каменные желваки.{/n} "Возможно, не без этого".
{n}You see Solomorne's jaw working in his stony face.{/n} "Maybe I am."
languages.original_text: {n}По лицу Соломона ходят каменные желваки.{/n} "Возможно, не без этого".

traits.locale_text: {n}You see Solomorne's jaw working in his stony face.{/n} "Maybe I am."
{n}You see Solomorne's jaw working in his stony face.{/n} "Maybe I am."
{n}You see Solomorne's jaw working in his stony face.{/n} "Maybe I am."
{n}You see Solomorne's jaw working in his stony face.{/n} "Maybe I am."
{n}You see Solomorne's jaw working in his stony face.{/n} "Maybe I am."

languages.text: {n}Solomorne reste de marbre, mais vous voyez sa mâchoire se serrer.{/n} « C'est bien possible. »
languages.original_text: {n}You see Solomorne's jaw working in his stony face.{/n} "Maybe I am."

traits.locale_text: {n}Solomorne reste de marbre, mais vous voyez sa mâchoire se serrer.{/n} « C'est bien possible. »

languages.text: {n}ソロモーンの石のように硬い表情の中で、顎の筋肉がわずかに動いているのが見えた。{/n}「…たぶん、そうなのかもしれません」
languages.original_text: {n}You see Solomorne's jaw working in his stony face.{/n} "Maybe I am."

traits.locale_text: {n}ソロモーンの石のように硬い表情の中で、顎の筋肉がわずかに動いているのが見えた。{/n}「…たぶん、そうなのかもしれません」

languages.text: {n}Solomorne mueve repetidamente la mandíbula antes de responder.{/n} «Es posible».
languages.original_text: {n}You see Solomorne's jaw working in his stony face.{/n} "Maybe I am."

traits.locale_text: {n}Solomorne mueve repetidamente la mandíbula antes de responder.{/n} «Es posible».

languages.text: {n}索罗蒙脸上没有任何表情，但下巴却抽搐着。{/n}“或许我真是个疯子。”
languages.original_text: {n}You see Solomorne's jaw working in his stony face.{/n} "Maybe I am."

traits.locale_text: {n}索罗蒙脸上没有任何表情，但下巴却抽搐着。{/n}“或许我真是个疯子。”

languages.original_text: {n}You see Solomorne's jaw working in his stony face.{/n} "Maybe I am."

languages.text: {n}Du siehst Solomornes Kiefer hinter seiner versteinerten Miene zucken.{/n} "Das mag sein."
languages.original_text: {n}You see Solomorne's jaw working in his stony face.{/n} "Maybe I am."

traits.locale_text: {n}Du siehst Solomornes Kiefer hinter seiner versteinerten Miene zucken.{/n} "Das mag sein."
